title: Howling Moon
description: One night would change her life forever.Emily Meyer’s life is blessed...until a mysterious animal attacks her one night in rural West Virginia. Now nothing is the same. She can’t eat. She can’t sleep. And her dreams are filled with terrifying nightmares that leave her exhausted and worried she’s losing her mind. Something is watching her every move. Now she’ll have to fight to survive...and to keep her humanity.
author: Steven Paul Watson
